item.title: Local AI Shenanigans
item.description:
My little adventure in Local AI (STT + Local LLMs)

In this post I‚Äôll show you how I navigated the Local AI world.

Local AI = the world where your AI runs on your own machine (or a private server), so you can avoid those pesky money-grabbing companies.
(Just kidding. I‚Äôm not against you guys hiring me.)

item.title: Hello
item.description:
Welcome to the first page of this blog.
Starting feels a little odd‚Äîquiet, almost like walking into an empty room and beginning to speak.

This post is mostly here for the record. There may not be much yet‚Ä¶ but maybe that‚Äôs the point.
To myself in five years: hi :D
